extDescription.message: Protect your online activities. LinkShield checks website reliability to fight phishing but cannot ensure full security. Stay cautious and avoid sharing sensitive information.

alertMessage.message: This website contains a link to:

severityMediumRisk.message: Medium risk: this link may be unsafe. Proceed with caution.

adviceCheckUrl.message: Only open this link if you are absolutely sure of its safety. Double-check the address carefully, and if it is a login page (for example, for your email or bank), make sure the URL is exactly correct before entering any credentials.

noHttps.message: Link does not use HTTPS. (high) - Data is transmitted in plain text and is vulnerable to interception.

ipAsDomain.message: IP address used instead of domain (high) - May hide the site's true identity and bypass domain-based security checks.

tooManySubdomains.message: Too many subdomains (high) - Excessive subdomains can be used to mimic trusted sites and confuse users.

suspiciousKeywords.message: Suspicious keywords detected (medium) - Keywords associated with scams or malware may indicate malicious intent.

suspiciousPattern.message: Suspicious URL pattern detected (high) - URL structure may be designed to deceive or obfuscate malicious content.

shortenedUrl.message: Shortened URL detected (high) - Shortened URLs hide the real destination, increasing phishing risk.

downloadPage.message: Suspicious download detected (high) - May host malware or unwanted software.

freeHosting.message: Free hosting platform detected (high) - Free hosting is often exploited due to weaker security controls.

encodedCharacters.message: URL contains too many encoded characters (high) - Excessive encoding can conceal malicious payloads.

homoglyphAttack.message: Homoglyph attack detected (medium) - Similar looking characters may mimic trusted domains to deceive users.

metaRedirect.message: Meta-refresh redirect detected (high) - Automatic redirects can lead users to malicious sites.

cryptoPhishing.message: Crypto-related phishing detected (high) - Often used to steal funds through fraudulent schemes.

externalScripts.message: Suspicious external scripts detected (high) - External scripts may load malicious content or track users.

suspiciousIframes.message: Suspicious iframes detected (high) - Iframes can embed harmful content from untrusted sources.

suspiciousParams.message: Suspicious query parameters detected (medium) - May be manipulated to exploit vulnerabilities.

mixedContent.message: Mixed content (HTTPS/HTTP) detected (medium) - Mixing secure and non-secure content undermines overall page security.

unusualPort.message: Unusual port detected in URL (high) - Non-standard ports can be used to bypass common security measures.

javascriptScheme.message: JavaScript scheme used in URL (high) - Using 'javascript:' can lead to execution of harmful code.

urlFragmentTrick.message: Suspicious URL fragment detected (medium) - Manipulated fragments can mislead users about the real destination.

suspiciousTLD.message: Suspicious top-level domain detected (high) - Certain TLDs are linked to higher risk and may be used maliciously.
suspiciousTLD.description: Warning for domains with suspicious TLDs

base64OrHex.message: Base64 or hexadecimal pattern detected (medium) - Obfuscated content may hide malicious instructions.
base64OrHex.description: Warning for detection of Base64 or hexadecimal patterns

iframeHidden.message: Iframe is hidden or too small (medium) - Hidden or unusually small iframes may be used to conceal malicious content.
iframeHidden.description: Warning for detection of hidden or minimal iframes

popupSubtitle.message: Enhance your security with real-time alerts and advanced online protection.

backgroundAnalysisDescription.message: Block the most recent phishing sites.

activationRequired.message: Activate this feature first to use it.

integratedProtectionDescription.message: Direct control of websites and links.

upgradePrompt.message: Upgrade to premium to unlock more features!

bulkUrlCheckDescription.message: Upload a .txt file to check multiple URLs at once.

safeDomain.message: This domain is recognized as safe.

allowedProtocol.message: This link uses an allowed protocol.

insecureLoginPage.message: This login page does not use HTTPS and may be unsafe. (high)

invalidUrl.message: This URL appears to be invalid or malformed.
